"Ah, it's you. Were you successful?": "Mhm... This crystal is more wonderful than I could have expected. I can see now how it acquired its reputation."

"My weapons are the only companions I can rely on...
I think this should be an appropriate expression of my gratitude."
"Thank you very much. Because of your efforts, my life of battle will be all the more fulfilling."
"I hope that you and I shall be able to fight alongside each other some day. From now on, I shall dedicate myself to my training, in anticipation of that glorious day."
